app.boxmate

Class Show

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.boxmate.Show

  • public class Show
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a show that is being played at certain venue. Customers can purchase tickets or rate it. Managers can create instances of a show and edit its details.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0 (24/05/2012)
    Author:
    Jonathan Tan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Show

        public Show()
        The default constructor for the Show class. It will assign all the values of the attributes to default values.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • Show

        public Show(java.lang.String name,
    java.lang.String description,
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> productionMembers,
    java.util.ArrayList<Showing> showings,
    Rating rating,
    double ranking)
        A constructor for the Show class that requires the user/program to specify all the attributes as parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the show or production.
        description - A description of the show or production.
        productionMembers - The names of all the people involved with the show or production.
        showings - A list of all the showings that the show has..
        rating - The content rating of the show.
        ranking - The average of all users’ rankings of the show or production, out of 5.
        Since:
        1.0.0
